title: Theodicy, Gnosticism, Neoplatonism and GrimGriz
description:
GrimGriz has questions about theodicy, neoplatonism and theology in general.

Original video:
https://youtu.be/LrZmbTu3Xpw

My video on theodicy:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=97xPBpQZKSo

SamAdams's discussion with John Vervaeke about Neoplatonism:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t3ZpIN85gBQ
